attributes.action: TV Licence FEE to be capped at £50
attributes.additional_details: Frankly, the TV licence fee is extortion pure and simple. A lot of the programs are either rubbish or repeats and the salaries paid are way too high. An immediate reduction in the licence fee to £50 will serve to concentrate the mindset of management and bring some much needed reality to the overpaid so called stars on show.
